resources.string:
What is OCA Kids Point?

 OCA Kids Point is the brand that is made for Kids for their entertainment and learning purpose. We are here to provide knowledge to your kid with best animated videos. So that your kid can learn something new.

 What content we provide?
 We provide the content for kids, where they can learn Nursery rhymes with best and cute animations for your kids. All nursery rhymes are available in our app.

 Why there are Ads in our application?
 To develop an app it requires large development and team to work. To manage the cost we show few ads that are friendly to kids.

 Are videos available offline?
 Yes all of our videos are available offline but make sure you need to download all these videos first. Downloading these videos require internet connection for the first time.

 Why should I download videos after downloading the app?
 To watch these videos you are require to download these video, as we have reduce size application so you can download the videos which you need.

 Downloading videos are slow? Why should I do?
 Downloading speed depends upon the speed of your internet. If your connection is slow then it will take some time to download the video.

 After downloading the videos I am unable to play the rhymes. What should I do?
 Make sure that the videos you downloaded are complete or you have enough space on your device.

 I donâ€™t like the app; I want to see other feature.
 If you have any query or suggestion then you can contact us at info@ocanalytica.com.
